text: Arap Islet () is an uninhabited island of Turkey. According to Turkish Atlas it is situated on the borderline of Aegean Sea and the Mediterranean Sea.Sabri Duran:Büyük Atlas , p. 27 Administratively it is a part of Marmaris ilçe (district) of Muğla Province at .Map page It is very close to the mainland (Anatolia). The channel between the mainland and the island is quite shallow; no more than .Coastquide Its surface area is about . ==References== Category:Islands of Turkey Category:Islands of Muğla Province Category:Marmaris District
title: Arap Islet
